scoringPlays.text: Austin Allen 1 Yd Run (Cole Hedlund Kick)
Cheyenne O'Grady 28 Yd pass from Austin Allen (Cole Hedlund Kick)
Keon Hatcher 12 Yd pass from Austin Allen (Cole Hedlund Kick)
Jerod Evans 4 Yd Run (Joey Slye Kick)
Sam Rogers 3 Yd pass from Jerod Evans (Joey Slye Kick)
Chris Cunningham 5 Yd pass from Jerod Evans (Joey Slye Kick)
Travon McMillian 6 Yd Run (Joey Slye Kick)
Jerod Evans 1 Yd Run (Joey Slye Kick)

videos.description: Virginia Tech's Sam Rogers loses the ball, and Arkansas' Brooks Ellis recovers it.
videos.headline: Arkansas forces fumble on V-Tech's opening drive

videos.description: Austin Allen passes to Devwah Whaley for 26 yards for an Arkansas first down.
videos.headline: Devwah Whaley makes a move for the 26-yard gain

videos.description: Arkansas' Austin Allen takes it himself for the 1-yard touchdown run.
videos.headline: Arkansas' QB sneaks into the end zone for the TD

videos.description: Arkansas' Ryan Pulley intercepts the Jerod Evans pass to give the Razorbacks the ball.
videos.headline: Arkansas' defense forces another turnover

videos.description: After Arkansas' defense got an interception, Austin Allen capitalizes by passing to Cheyenne O'Grady for a 28-yard touchdown.
videos.headline: Arkansas turns a turnover into a TD

videos.description: Austin Allen passes to Keon Hatcher, who makes the tiptoe catch for 12 yards for the touchdown.
videos.headline: Arkansas WR makes tiptoe catch in end zone

videos.description: Virginia Tech's Jerod Evan runs it for a 33-yard gain.
videos.headline: Jerod Evans runs for 33 yards

videos.description: Arkansas head coach Bret Bielema talks about Arkansas' shutout against Virginia Tech in the first half.
videos.headline: Arkansas head coach Bret Bielema discusses defensive performance against Virginia Tech

videos.description: Virginia Tech head coach Justin Fuente talks about trying to overcome shutout against Arkansas.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech head coach Justin Fuente talks about playing from behind

videos.description: Arkansas' Drew Morgan fumbles the ball and its recovered by Virginia Tech.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech's defense forces fumble to energize team

videos.description: Jerod Evans runs it into the end zone for a 4 yard score to get Virginia Tech on the board.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech scores TD off turnover

videos.description: Virginia Tech's Anthony Shegog intercepts Austin Allen.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech forces second turnover of second half

videos.description: Jerod Evans finds Sam Rogers for a 3-yard touchdown and Virginia Tech cuts the deficit to 24-14.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech's Rogers makes one-handed catch for the TD

videos.description: Virginia Tech's Tremaine Edmunds intercepts Austin Allen, setting up the Hokies with good field position.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech interception sets up offense

videos.description: After the Virginia Tech defense gets another interception, Jerod Evans connects with Chris Cunningham for a 5-yard touchdown to come within three.
videos.headline: Viginia Tech scores off another Arkansas turnover

videos.description: Virginia Tech scores 28 unanswered points, capped by Travon McMillian's 6-yard rushing touchdown, to take a 28-24 lead over Arkansas.
videos.headline: VT erases 24-point deficit to take lead
ARK vs. VT

videos.description: Virginia Tech's Terrell Edmunds gets the interception, setting up the Hokies with great field position.
videos.headline: VT forces another turnover in the second half

videos.description: Jerod Evans runs it in for the 1-yard touchdown to give the Hokies the 35-24 lead.
videos.headline: VT makes it 35 unanswered points with Evans' rushing TD in win

videos.description: Virginia Tech head coach Justin Fuente talks about making largest comeback in program history with Belk Bowl win over Arkansas.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech coach Justin Fuente talks about scoring 35 unanswered points

videos.description: Virginia Tech lifts the Belk Bowl trophy.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech lifts the Belk Bowl trophy

videos.description: Virginia Tech's Justin Fuente talks about the comeback victory over the Razorbacks to win the Hokies the Belk Bowl.
videos.headline: VT's Justin Fuente talks about the comeback victory over the Razorbacks

videos.description: Virginia Tech S Cam Phillips talks about the tough season for the Hokies as they overcome 24 point deficit to win the Belk Bowl.
videos.headline: VT's Cam Phillips talks about the tough season for the Hokies

videos.description: Breaking Down Virginia Tech's strong defense as they score 35 unanswered points to win the Belk Bowl and take down Arkansas.
videos.headline: Breaking Down Virginia Tech's come from behind victory over Arkansas

videos.description: Down 24-0 at halftime, Virginia Tech storms back against Arkansas to score 35 unanswered points in the second half and win the Belk Bowl.
videos.headline: How Virginia Tech erased a 24-0 deficit for the win

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (How Virginia Tech erased a 24-0 deficit for the win) 2016/12/29 ENHL

videos.description: Down 24-0 entering the second half, Virginia Tech scores 35 unanswered points to defeat Arkansas in the Belk Bowl.
videos.headline: Virginia Tech overcomes 24-point deficit to win Belk Bowl
